TopicTitle: How to do the mission "transport a vip to your destination and return"?

Articles.Content: How to do the mission "transport a vip to your destination and return"?

Hi Deniel. Welcome to our forum, and I have most your question to the questions subforum. 

When you look at your choices for crew on that mission, you will see someone whose job is listed as "tourist." This is the person you need to take to a destination. The contract tells you what the destination is. Put that person on a ship, fly it to the destination, then land back on the home planet. That will complete the mission.

Note that you can't send tourists outside your ship so if you need to transfer tourists and VIPs between ships(to a lander for example) they will need to be docked together to allow internal transfer.
